msg_buffer_size.name: Number of data items
msg_buffer_size.description: The number of data entries carried in each request, 0 means no limit
msg_buffer_size.description_zh: 每次请求所携带的数据条目数，为 0 表示不限制

ips.name: Outbound Network Card List
ips.description: List of IP addresses of network cards used for concurrent data transmission. Multiple IP addresses are separated by colons ";"
ips.description_zh: 并发传输数据使用的网卡的ip地址列表，多个ip地址用冒号“;”分隔
